channel.title: Installation on Graphite
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Graphite

item.title: Windows
item.description: Windows To install Graphite on Windows, follow these steps: Go to the Releases page. Download the latest Windows setup file. Run the downloaded setup file and follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation. During installation, grant administrative privileges when prompted by the User Account Control (UAC) dialog. Once installed, you can launch Graphite from the Start Menu or your desktop.

item.title: Linux
item.description: Linux To install Graphite on Linux, follow these steps: Open a terminal. Run the following commands to run Graphite: wget https://github.com/Meliani-Mehdi/Graphite_QT/releases/download/Graphite/Graphite_V1.0_Linux.tar.gz tar -zxvf Graphite_V1.0_Linux.tar.gz cd Graphite_V1.0_Linux ./Graphite

item.title: mac
item.description: macOS To install Graphite on macOS, follow these steps: Open a terminal. Run the following commands to run Graphite: wget https://github.com/Meliani-Mehdi/Graphite_QT/releases/download/Graphite/Graphite_V1.0_Linux.tar.gz tar -zxvf Graphite_V1.0_Linux.tar.gz cd Graphite_V1.0_Linux ./Graphite
